items.name: Supreme Healing Potion
items.description: An extremely potent healing potion that restores a large amount of health.

items.name: Bear Berserker's Axe
items.description: A massive battle axe used by bear berserkers. It's surprisingly well-balanced despite its size.

items.name: Crystal-Infused Armor
items.description: Leather armor with blue crystals embedded throughout. It seems to absorb impacts.

items.name: Bear Shaman's Talisman
items.description: A powerful talisman worn by bear shamans. It's made from bones, feathers, and crystal fragments.

items.name: Platinum Coins
items.description: Rare platinum coins of unknown origin.

items.name: Large Magic Crystal
items.description: A large crystal that pulses rhythmically with blue energy. You can feel its power even at a distance.
